ComicInfo.Title: Part Three: Follow the Fox
ComicInfo.Summary:
With the mystery of Emily's disappearance growing deeper and darker, events take a nightmarish turn. As Hellinger navigates surreal, haunted dreamscapes, he is confronted with ghosts from his past, and chilling omens of his future. Elsewhere, enemies are revealed, and sharp implements are put to use. Features a cover by superstar artist Garry Brown (The Massive.)
